trans-unit.source: The Item which is the scope of the handler; the Item in which it was declared. The handler will handle events on behalf of this Item, which means a pointer event is relevant if at least one of its event points occurs within the Item's interior. Initially target() is the same, but it can be reassigned.
trans-unit.target: 的项目，其是处理程序的范围; 声明它的项目。处理程序将代表此Item处理事件，这意味着如果至少一个事件点发生在Item的内部，则指针事件是相关的。最初，target（）相同，但是可以重新分配。

trans-unit.source: The Item which is the scope of the handler; the Item in which it was declared. The handler will handle events on behalf of this Item, which means a pointer event is relevant if at least one of its event points occurs within the Item's interior. Initially target() is the same, but it can be reassigned.
trans-unit.target: 的项目，其是处理程序的范围; 声明它的项目。处理程序将代表该Item处理事件，这意味着如果至少一个事件点发生在Item的内部，则指针事件是相关的。最初，target（）是相同的，但是可以重新分配它。

trans-unit.source: The Item::enabled property is used to enable and disable touch handling. When disabled, the touch area becomes transparent to mouse and touch events.
trans-unit.target: 该项目::启用属性用来启用和禁用触摸操作。禁用后，触摸区域对鼠标和触摸事件变为透明。

trans-unit.source: The implicitHeight property must be set, and it must be the same for each delegate.
trans-unit.target: 该implicitHeight属性必须设置，它必须为每个代表相同的。

trans-unit.source: The implicitWidth and implicitHeight of a control are typically based on the implicit sizes of the background and the content item plus any insets and paddings. These properties determine how large the control will be when no explicit width or height is specified.
trans-unit.target: 控件的implicitWidth和implicitHeight通常基于背景和内容项的隐式大小以及所有插入和填充。这些属性确定未指定显式宽度或高度时控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The implicitWidth property must be set, and should be the same value for each separator.
trans-unit.target: 该implicitWidth属性必须设置，应该是每一个分离器相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The ItemGrabResult is a small container used to encapsulate the results from Item::grabToImage().
trans-unit.target: 所述ItemGrabResult是用于封装从结果的小容器项目:: grabToImage（） 。

trans-unit.source: The LayoutMirroring attached property is used to horizontally mirror Item anchors, positioner types (such as Row and Grid) and views (such as GridView and horizontal ListView). Mirroring is a visual change: left anchors become right anchors, and positioner types like Grid and Row reverse the horizontal layout of child items.
trans-unit.target: 所述LayoutMirroring附加属性被用于水平镜项锚，定位器类型（如行和网格）和视图（如GridView的和水平的ListView）。镜像是一种视觉变化：左定位符变为右定位符，并且诸如Grid和Row之类的定位器类型反转了子项的水平布局。

trans-unit.source: The rows property works in a similar way, but items are auto-positioned vertically. The rows property is only used when flow is GridLayout.TopToBottom.
trans-unit.target: 该行物业工作以类似的方式，但项目是自动垂直放置。该行当时的物业仅用于流量是 GridLayout.TopToBottom 。

trans-unit.source: The fillWidth and fillHeight properties can either be true or false. If they are false, the item's size will be fixed to its preferred size. Otherwise, it will grow or shrink between its minimum and maximum size as the layout is resized.
trans-unit.target: 该fillWidth和fillHeight性质可以是 true 或 false 。如果它们为 false ，则项目的大小将固定为其首选大小。否则，在调整布局大小时，它将在最小和最大尺寸之间增大或缩小。

trans-unit.source: The StackLayout class provides a stack of items where only one item is visible at a time. More...
trans-unit.target: 该StackLayout类提供的物品堆在那里只有一个项目是可见的一段时间。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ListView shows the content of the corresponding model. The delegate is responsible for the format of the list items. The appearance of each item of the list in the delegate can be defined separately (it is not web engine specific).
trans-unit.target: 该ListView中显示相应的模型的内容。委托负责列表项的格式。可以单独定义委托中列表中每个项目的外观（不是Web引擎特定的）。

trans-unit.source: The ListView type has the sectionattached property that can combine adjacent and related types into a section. The section.property determines which list type property to use as sections. The section.criteria can dictate how the section names are displayed and the section.delegate is similar to the views' delegate property.
trans-unit.target: 所述的ListView类型具有 section 附加属性，可以邻近和相关类型组合成一个部分。所述 section.property 确定哪个列表类型属性，以用作切片。该 section.criteria 可支配部分名称的显示方式和 section.delegate 类似的意见委托财产。

trans-unit.source: The ListView type has the sectionattached property that can combine adjacent and related types into a section. The section.property determines which list type property to use as sections. The section.criteria can dictate how the section names are displayed and the section.delegate is similar to the views' delegate property.
trans-unit.target: 所述的ListView类型具有 section 附加属性，可以邻近和相关类型组合成一个部分。所述 section.property 确定哪个列表类型属性，以用作切片。该 section.criteria 可支配部分名称的显示方式和 section.delegate 类似的意见委托财产。

trans-unit.source: The ListView will lay out the items based on the size of the root item in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 该ListView控件将布局基于委托根项目规模的项目。

trans-unit.source: The status of an inactive loader is always Null.
trans-unit.target: 非活动加载程序的状态始终为 Null 。

trans-unit.source: The enabled property is used to enable and disable mouse handling for the proxied item. When disabled, the mouse area becomes transparent to mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 该启用属性用于启用和禁用鼠标操作为代理的项目。禁用时，鼠标区域对鼠标事件变为透明。

trans-unit.source: The pressed read-only property indicates whether or not the user is holding down a mouse button over the mouse area. This property is often used in bindings between properties in a user interface. The containsMouse read-only property indicates the presence of the mouse cursor over the mouse area but, by default, only when a mouse button is held down; see the containsMouse documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 所述压制只读属性指示用户是否被按住在鼠标区域鼠标按钮。此属性通常用于用户界面中属性之间的绑定。所述containsMouse只读属性指示鼠标光标放在鼠标区域的存在，但是，在默认情况下，只有当鼠标按钮被按住; 有关详细信息，请参见containsMouse文档。

trans-unit.source: The mouse parameter provides information about the click, including the x and y position of the release of the click, and whether the click was held.
trans-unit.target: 该鼠标参数提供了有关点击的信息，包括点击释放的X和Y位置，然后单击是否举行。

trans-unit.source: The mouse parameter provides information about the mouse, including the x and y position, and any buttons currently pressed.
trans-unit.target: 的鼠标参数提供有关鼠标信息，包括x和y位置，和当前按下任何按钮。

trans-unit.source: The OpacityAnimator type animates the opacity of an Item. More...
trans-unit.target: 该OpacityAnimator类型的动画项目的不透明度。更多...

trans-unit.source: The OpenGLInfo attached type provides information about the OpenGL version being used to render the surface of the attachee item.
trans-unit.target: 所述OpenGLInfo连接类型提供了被用于呈现attachee物品的表面有关的OpenGL版本信息。

trans-unit.source: The CumulativeDirection element will act as a direction that sums the directions within it.
trans-unit.target: 所述CumulativeDirection元件将作为求和内它的方向的方向。

trans-unit.source: The ParticleSystem type ties all the other types together, and manages the shared timeline. Painters, Emitters and Affectors must all have the same ParticleSystem to be able to interact with each other.
trans-unit.target: 该粒子系统类型联系所有其他类型一起，并管理共享时间表。画家，发射者和附属者必须都具有相同的“ 粒子系统”，才能彼此交互。

trans-unit.source: The PointDirection element allows both the specification of a direction by x and y components, as well as varying the parameters by x or y component.
trans-unit.target: 所述PointDirection元件允许通过x和y分量的方向上两者的规范，以及改变由x或y分量的参数。

trans-unit.source: The PathAttribute object allows attributes consisting of a name and a value to be specified for various points along a path. The attributes are exposed to the delegate as Attached Properties. The value of an attribute at any particular point along the path is interpolated from the PathAttributes bounding that point.
trans-unit.target: 所述PathAttribute对象允许沿路径的各个点被指定由名称和一个值的属性。这些属性作为“ 附加属性”公开给委托。从沿该点限制的PathAttributes插值沿路径的任何特定点的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The enabled property is used to enable and disable pinch handling for the proxied item. When disabled, the pinch area becomes transparent to mouse/touch events.
trans-unit.target: 该启用属性用于启用和禁用捏处理由代理项目。禁用后，收缩区域对鼠标/触摸事件变为透明。

trans-unit.source: The pinch parameter (not the same as the pinch property) provides information about the pinch gesture, including the scale, center and angle of the pinch.
trans-unit.target: 所述夹送参数（不一样的箍缩性）提供了关于捏合姿态信息，包括夹管的规模，中心和角度。

trans-unit.source: The pinch parameter (not the same as the pinch property) provides information about the pinch gesture, including the scale, center and angle of the pinch. At the time of the pinchStarted signal, these values are reset to the default values, regardless of the results from previous gestures: pinch.scale will be 1.0 and pinch.rotation will be 0.0. As the gesture progresses, pinchUpdated will report the deviation from those defaults.
trans-unit.target: 所述夹送参数（不一样的箍缩性）提供了关于捏合姿态信息，包括夹管的规模，中心和角度。在 pinchStarted 信号发生时，无论先前手势的结果如何，这些值都将重置为默认值：pinch.scale将为 1.0 且pinch.rotation将为 0.0 。随着手势的进行，pinchUpdated将报告与默认值的偏差。

trans-unit.source: The pinch parameter provides information about the pinch gesture, including the location where the gesture occurred. pinch.scale will be greater than zero when the gesture indicates that the user wishes to enter smart zoom, and zero when exiting (even though typically the same gesture is used to toggle between the two states).
trans-unit.target: 该捏参数提供有关缩放手势信息，包括手势发生时的位置。当手势指示用户希望输入智能缩放时， pinch.scale 会大于零；退出时，pinch.scale会大于零（即使通常使用相同的手势在两种状态之间切换）。

trans-unit.source: The pinch parameter provides information about the pinch gesture, including the scale, center and angle of the pinch. These values reflect changes only since the beginning of the current gesture, and therefore are not limited by the minimum and maximum limits in the pinch property.
trans-unit.target: 所述夹送参数提供关于捏合姿态信息，包括夹管的规模，中心和角度。这些值仅反映自当前手势开始以来的变化，因此不受收缩属性中的最小和最大限制。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyChanges type will change the values of object properties. Objects are referenced through their id. Objects outside the component are also referenced using the id property, exemplified by the property change to the external flag object.
trans-unit.target: 的PropertyChanges类型将改变对象属性的值。对象通过其id引用。组件外部的对象也使用 id 属性进行引用，以属性更改为外部 flag 对象为例。

trans-unit.source: The Rectangle and Text types used in the above example are both provided by the QtQuick import. Putting the import and object declaration together, we get a complete QML document:
trans-unit.target: 上例中使用的Rectangle和Text类型均由 QtQuick 导入提供。将导入和对象声明放在一起，我们得到一个完整的QML文档：

trans-unit.source: The Rectangle background item is a child of the label, so it naturally receives events before it. In practice, this means that the background color will change, but the onClicked handler in the label will never get called.
trans-unit.target: “ 矩形”背景项是标签的子项，因此它自然会在其之前接收事件。实际上，这意味着背景颜色将发生变化，但是标签中的 onClicked 处理函数将永远不会被调用。

trans-unit.source: The RegExpValidator type provides a validator, which counts as valid any string which matches a specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 所述RegExpValidator类型提供一个校验器，它计数为有效的，其符合指定的正则表达式的任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: The RotationAnimator type animates the rotation of an Item. More...
trans-unit.target: RotationAnimator类型为Item 的旋转动画。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ScaleAnimator type animates the scale factor of an Item. More...
trans-unit.target: 该ScaleAnimator类型的动画项目的比例因子。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D compositingMode has to be set to FBO
trans-unit.target: 该Scene3D compositingMode必须设置到FBO

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D entity property is left unset
trans-unit.target: 该Scene3D实体属性未设置

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D instance is instantiated prior to any Scene3DView
trans-unit.target: 该Scene3D实例之前的任何Scene3DView实例

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D is sized to occupy the full window size (at the very least it must be sized as wide as the area occupied by all Scene3DViews)
trans-unit.target: 该Scene3D的大小，以占据整个窗口大小（至少是它的尺寸必须为宽的区域占据所有Scene3DViews）

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D type is used to integrate a Qt3D scene into a QtQuick 2 scene. More...
trans-unit.target: 该Scene3D类型用于一个Qt3D场景集成到QtQuick 2的场景。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D type renders a Qt3D scene, provided by an Entity, into a multisampled Framebuffer object. This object is later blitted into a non-multisampled Framebuffer object, which is then rendered with premultiplied alpha. If multisampling is not required, it can be avoided by setting the multisample property to false. In this case Scene3D will render directly into the non-multisampled Framebuffer object.
trans-unit.target: 所述Scene3D类型呈现一个Qt3D场景，通过提供实体，为多采样帧缓冲区对象。此对象随后被渗入非多重采样的Framebuffer对象，然后使用预乘alpha渲染该对象。如果不需要多重采样，可以通过将multisample属性设置为 false 来避免。在这种情况下，Scene3D将直接渲染到非多重采样的Framebuffer对象中。

trans-unit.source: The compositingMode is set to FBO
trans-unit.target: 该compositingMode设置为FBO

trans-unit.source: The SequentialAnimation and ParallelAnimation types allow multiple animations to be run together. Animations defined in a SequentialAnimation are run one after the other, while animations defined in a ParallelAnimation are run at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 该SequentialAnimation和ParallelAnimation类型允许多个动画一起运行。在SequentialAnimation中定义的动画一个接一个地运行，而在ParallelAnimation中定义的动画则同时运行。

trans-unit.source: The SequentialAnimation and ParallelAnimation types allow multiple animations to be run together. Animations defined in a SequentialAnimation are run one after the other, while animations defined in a ParallelAnimation are run at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 该SequentialAnimation和ParallelAnimation类型允许多个动画一起运行。在SequentialAnimation中定义的动画是一个接一个地运行的，而在ParallelAnimation中定义的动画是同时运行的。

trans-unit.source: The SequentialAnimation type is also useful for playing transition animations because animations are played in parallel inside transitions.
trans-unit.target: 该SequentialAnimation类型也是打有用的过渡动画，因为动画并行内部转换播放。

trans-unit.source: The SequentialAnimation type is also useful for playing transition animations because animations are played in parallel inside transitions.
trans-unit.target: 该SequentialAnimation类型也是打有用的过渡动画，因为动画并行内部转换播放。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffect QML type is fully functional with the D3D12 adaptation as well. However, the interpretation of the fragmentShader and vertexShader properties is different than with OpenGL.
trans-unit.target: 所述ShaderEffect QML类型是全功能与D3D12适配为好。但是，fragmentShader和vertexShader属性的解释与OpenGL不同。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffect type applies a custom vertex and fragment (pixel) shader to a rectangle. It allows you to write effects such as drop shadow, blur, colorize and page curl directly in QML.
trans-unit.target: 所述ShaderEffect类型适用的自定义顶点和片段（像素）着色器来的矩形。它使您可以直接在QML中编写阴影，模糊，着色和页面卷曲等效果。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffect type can be combined with layered items.
trans-unit.target: 该ShaderEffect类型可以结合分层项目。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffect type makes it possible to place GLSL code inline in a Qt Quick application with very little overhead. However, it is important to realize that the fragment program needs to run for every pixel in the rendered shape. When deploying to low-end hardware and the shader is covering a large amount of pixels, one should keep the fragment shader to a few instructions to avoid poor performance.
trans-unit.target: 使用ShaderEffect类型，可以以很少的开销将GLSL代码内联放置在Qt Quick应用程序中。但是，重要的是要认识到片段程序需要为渲染形状中的每个像素运行。当部署到低端硬件并且着色器覆盖大量像素时，应该将片段着色器遵循一些指令，以避免性能下降。

trans-unit.source: The vertexShader and fragmentShader properties are URLs in Qt 6, and work very similarly to Image.source, for example. Only the file and qrc schemes are supported with ShaderEffect, however. It is also possible to omit the file scheme, allowing to specify a relative path in a convenient way. Such a path is resolved relative to the component's (the .qml file's) location.
trans-unit.target: 的vertexShader和fragmentShader性质在Qt的6网址，和工作非常类似于Image.source，例如。但是， qrc 仅支持 file 和qrc方案。也可以省略 file 方案，从而允许以方便的方式指定相对路径。相对于组件（ .qml 文件）的位置来解析这样的路径。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffectSource type does not redirect any mouse or keyboard input to sourceItem. If you hide the sourceItem by setting visible to false or opacity to zero, it will no longer react to input. In cases where the ShaderEffectSource is meant to replace the sourceItem, you typically want to hide the sourceItem while still handling input. For this, you can use the hideSource property.
trans-unit.target: 该ShaderEffectSource类型不重定向任何鼠标或键盘输入到sourceItem。如果通过将visible设置为false或opacity设置为零来隐藏sourceItem，它将不再对输入作出反应。如果ShaderEffectSource打算替换sourceItem，则通常需要在仍处理输入的同时隐藏sourceItem。为此，您可以使用hideSource属性。

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffectSource type renders sourceItem into a texture and displays it in the scene. sourceItem is drawn into the texture as though it was a fully opaque root item. Thus sourceItem itself can be invisible, but still appear in the texture.
trans-unit.target: 该ShaderEffectSource类型呈现sourceItem到纹理，并显示在场景中。将sourceItem绘制到纹理中，就好像它是一个完全不透明的根项。因此sourceItem本身可以是不可见的，但仍会出现在纹理中。

trans-unit.source: The SystemPalette type provides access to the Qt application palettes. This provides information about the standard colors used for application windows, buttons and other features. These colors are grouped into three
trans-unit.target: 该SystemPalette类型提供访问Qt应用程序的调色板。这提供了有关用于应用程序窗口，按钮和其他功能的标准颜色的信息。这些颜色分为三类

trans-unit.target: 该文本对象的属性可以通过访问QQmlProperty，就像这样：

trans-unit.target: 该文本对象的属性可以用QQmlProperty进行访问，就像这样：

trans-unit.source: The elide property can alternatively be used to fit a single line of plain text to a set width.
trans-unit.target: 所述的Elid属性可以备选地使用纯文本的一行适合于一组宽度。

trans-unit.source: The TextEdit item displays a block of editable, formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 在文本编辑项显示可编辑的，格式化的文本块。

trans-unit.source: The TextInput type displays a single line of editable plain text.
trans-unit.target: 所述的TextInput型显示器可编辑纯文本的一行。

trans-unit.source: The TouchPoint type contains information about a touch point, such as the current position, pressure, and area.
trans-unit.target: 的接触点类型包含有关的触摸点，诸如当前位置，压力和区域信息。

trans-unit.source: The UniformAnimator type animates a uniform of a ShaderEffect. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述UniformAnimator类型动画一个的均匀ShaderEffect。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition attached property provides the following properties specific to the item to which the transition is applied:
trans-unit.target: 所述ViewTransition附加属性提供以下属性特定于被施加的过渡项：

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition.targetIndexes and ViewTransition.targetItems lists provide the items and indexes of all delegate instances that are the targets of the relevant operation. For an add operation, these are all the items that are added into the view; for a remove, these are all the items removed from the view, and so on. (Note these lists will only contain references to items that have been created within the view or its cached items; targets that are not within the visible area of the view or within the item cache will not be accessible.)
trans-unit.target: 该ViewTransition。targetIndexes和ViewTransition。targetItems列表提供作为相关操作目标的所有委托实例的项目和索引。对于添加操作，这些是添加到视图中的所有项目；对于删除，这些是从视图中删除的所有项目，依此类推。 （请注意，这些列表仅包含对在视图中创建的项目或其缓存项目的引用；不在视图可见区域或项目缓存中的目标将不可访问。）

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition.item property gives a reference to the item to which the transition is being applied. This can be used to access any of the item's attributes, custom property values, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 所述ViewTransition .item属性给出到被施加的过渡项的引用。这可用于访问项目的任何属性，自定义 property 值等。

trans-unit.source: The EnterKeyAction must be used directly inside the item receiving input focus, e.g. TextInput.
trans-unit.target: 所述EnterKeyAction必须直接在项目接收输入焦点内被使用，例如的TextInput。

trans-unit.source: The EnterKeyAction type provides attached properties which allows customizing the enter key button of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 所述EnterKeyAction类型提供附加属性，其允许自定义输入键盘的键按钮。

trans-unit.source: The HandwritingInputPanel is an add-on component for the InputPanel, which enables full-screen handwriting input for the application.
trans-unit.target: 该HandwritingInputPanel是用于一个附加部件输入面板，这使得能够全屏手写输入的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The InputContext can be accessed as singleton instance.
trans-unit.target: 该InputContext可以为单一实例进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The InputEngine class provides an input engine that supports C++ and QML integration. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述InputEngine类提供了支持C ++和QML集成的输入引擎。更多...

trans-unit.source: The InputMethod type lets you create a custom input method which can be assigned to InputEngine.
trans-unit.target: 该INPUTMETHOD类型，您可以创建可分配到自定义输入法InputEngine。

trans-unit.source: The InputMethod::inputModes() method is called by the input engine before an input mode is set. The method returns a list of input modes available in the given locale.
trans-unit.target: 在设置输入模式之前，输入引擎将调用InputMethod :: inputModes（）方法。该方法返回给定语言环境中可用的输入模式的列表。

trans-unit.target: 该INPUTMETHOD :: selectionListData回调请求的数据项。

trans-unit.source: The InputMethod::selectionListItemCount callback requests the number of items in the list identified by the given type.
trans-unit.target: 该INPUTMETHOD :: selectionListItemCount回调要求在由给定类型确定的列表项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionListModel is a data model for word candidates provided by the input method.
trans-unit.target: 该SelectionListModel是由输入方法提供候选单词的数据模型。

trans-unit.source: The activeItemChanged signal indicates which item is currently highlighted by the input method. The view should respond to this signal by highlighting the corresponding item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 所述activeItemChanged信号指示哪个项目当前由输入方法突出显示。视图应通过突出显示列表中的相应项目来响应此信号。

trans-unit.target: 所述KeyIcon项显示具有可调颜色的图标。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionListItem enables mouse handling for the selection list item delegates.
trans-unit.target: 该SelectionListItem使鼠标操作的选择列表项的代表。

trans-unit.source: The wheel parameter provides information about the event, including the x and y position, any buttons currently pressed, and information about the wheel movement, including angleDelta and pixelDelta.

trans-unit.source: The XmlListModel data is loaded asynchronously, and status is set to XmlListModel.Ready when loading is complete. Note this means when XmlListModel is used for a view, the view is not populated until the model is loaded.

trans-unit.source: The BufferInput command type is used to expose custom texture buffers to the render pass.
trans-unit.target: 的BufferInput命令类型用于暴露自定义纹理缓冲器的渲染过程。

trans-unit.source: The diffuse color property describes the basic color of the material, and unlike the PrincipledMaterial's base color, the diffuse color does not contain any information about the material reflectance. However, for reflective surfaces the diffuse color should be set to a black tint, as that will allow for the specular color to contribute.
trans-unit.target: 所述漫反射颜色属性描述该材料的基本色，并且不同于PrincipledMaterial的基色，漫反射颜色不包含有关的材料的反射率的任何信息。但是，对于反射表面，应将漫反射颜色设置为黑色，因为这将允许镜面反射颜色起作用。

trans-unit.source: The specular reflectivity describes the specular amount and color of an object's surface. For reflective materials the main color contribution, comes from this property.
trans-unit.target: 的镜面反射率描述了一个对象的表面的镜面反射量和颜色。对于反光材料，主要的颜色贡献来自于此属性。

trans-unit.source: The Effect type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 该效果是不支持的类型。

trans-unit.source: The status of an inactive loader is always Null.
trans-unit.target: 不活动的加载程序的状态始终为 Null 。

trans-unit.source: The PrincipledMaterial QML type has been greatly improved in Qt Quick 6.0, and now more closely follows the principles of Physically Based Rendering. Imported models should now render correctly without changing properties of the materials. Existing materials will need to be changed to undo any compensations for previous inaccuracies.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick 6.0中对PrincipledMaterial QML类型进行了很大的改进，现在更紧密地遵循了基于物理的渲染原理。现在，导入的模型应该正确渲染，而无需更改材质的属性。需要更改现有材料以撤消对先前不准确之处的任何补偿。

trans-unit.source: The base color of a metal/roughness material contains both the diffuse and the specular data, how much the base color is interpreted as one or the other is primarily dictated by the metalness value. For example, a material with a metalness value of 1, will have most of its base color interpreted as specular color, while the diffuse color would be a black tint. The opposite would happen for a material with a metalness value of 0. This is of course a bit simplified, but gives a rough idea how the base color and metalness value interacts. For those more familiar with a Specular/Glossiness workflow, there's a clear difference here which is worth noting, namely that the color data of the two materials are not directly compatible, since in a Specular/Glossiness material, the diffuse and specular color comes from separate inputs.
trans-unit.target: 的基色的金属/粗糙度材料同时包含漫反射和镜面反射的数据，多少基色被解释为一种或另一种主要由决定 metalness 值。例如，金属性值为1的材料会将其大部分基础颜色解释为镜面颜色，而漫反射颜色将为黑色。金属性值为0的材料将发生相反的情况。这当然有点简化，但是粗略了解了基色和 metalness 价值互动。对于那些熟悉镜面/光泽度工作流程的人来说，这里有一个明显的区别值得注意，即两种材料的颜色数据不直接兼容，因为在镜面/光泽度材料中，漫反射和镜面反射的颜色来自单独的输入。

trans-unit.source: The depthTestEnabled property is an advanced feature that can be used to improve performance under certain specific scenarios. It can be activated per-scene to enable a separate one pass rendering technique that can achieve better performance than the default rendering technique, by eliminating depth testing in cases where 3D objects do not overlap or intersect.
trans-unit.target: 该depthTestEnabled属性是一个先进的功能，可用于提高在某些特定情况下的性能。通过在3D对象不重叠或不相交的情况下消除深度测试，可以按场景激活它以启用单独的一遍渲染技术，该技术可以实现比默认渲染技术更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: The View3D component works like any other QQuickItem derived class with content and implements the virtual function QQuickItem::updatePaintNode. Qt Quick calls updatePaintNode for all "dirty" items in the Qt Quick scenegraph during the synchronization phase. This includes the 3D items managed by a View3D, which also undergo their synchronization phase as a result of the updatePaintNode call.
trans-unit.target: 该View3D像任何其他组件的工作原理QQuickItem派生类的内容，并实现虚函数QQuickItem :: updatePaintNode。Qt Quick在同步阶段为Qt Quick场景图中的所有“脏”项目调用updatePaintNode。这包括由View3D管理的3D项目，由于updatePaintNode调用，这些项目也经历了它们的同步阶段。

trans-unit.source: The View3D's scene graph is embedded into the main scene graph, and the same ordering semantics are applied as to any other Qt Quick Item. As this mode can lead to subtle issues, depending on the contents of the scene, due to injecting depth-based 3D content into a 2D scene graph, it is not recommended to be used, unless a specific need arises.
trans-unit.target: 所述View3D的场景图被嵌入到主场景图，并且相同的排序语义被应用为到任何其它的Qt快速项目。由于根据场景的内容，由于将基于深度的3D内容注入2D场景图中，此模式会导致细微的问题，因此除非有特殊需要，否则不建议使用此模式。

trans-unit.source: The Inline render mode uses QSGRenderNode, which enables direct rendering to Qt Quick's render target without using an offscreen surface. It does this by injecting the render commands inline during the 2D rendering of the Qt Quick Scene.
trans-unit.target: 该内联渲染模式使用QSGRenderNode，这使得直接渲染到Qt Quick的的渲染目标，而无需使用屏幕外表面。它是通过在Qt Quick Scene的2D渲染期间内联注入渲染命令来实现的。

trans-unit.target: 该ScxmlStateMachine类型是的执行状态图XML（SCXML） 。

trans-unit.source: The keyPress(), keyRelease(), and keyClick() methods can be used to simulate keyboard events within unit tests. The events are delivered to the currently focused QML item. You can pass either a Qt.Key enum value or a latin1 char (string of length one)
trans-unit.target: 所述按键（） ，keyRelease（） ，和keyClick（）方法可用于模拟键盘事件的单元测试中。事件将传递到当前关注的QML项目。您可以传递Qt.Key枚举值或latin1字符（长度为一的字符串）

trans-unit.source: The IviApplication extension provides a way to associate an IviSurface with a regular Wayland surface. Using the IviSurface interface, the client can identify itself by giving an ivi id, and the compositor can ask the client to resize.
trans-unit.target: 该IviApplication扩展提供了一种联营IviSurface与常规Wayland的表面。使用IviSurface界面，客户端可以通过提供ivi id来标识自己，合成器可以要求客户端调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The WaylandCompositor manages the connections to the clients, as well as the different outputs and seats.
trans-unit.target: 该WaylandCompositor管理连接到客户端，以及不同的输出和座位。

trans-unit.source: The WaylandOutput manages a rectangular area within bounds of the compositor's geometry, to use it for displaying client content. This could, for instance, be a screen managed by the WaylandCompositor.
trans-unit.target: 该WaylandOutput管理一个矩形区域合成器的几何形状的范围内，用它来显示客户端内容。例如，这可能是WaylandCompositor管理的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The WaylandSeat type provides access to different types of user input and maintains a keyboard focus and a mouse pointer. It corresponds to the wl_seat interface in the Wayland protocol.
trans-unit.target: 所述WaylandSeat类型提供访问不同类型的用户输入，并保持一个键盘焦点和鼠标指示器。它对应于Wayland协议中的wl_seat接口。

trans-unit.source: The WaylandView corresponds to the presentation of a surface on a specific output, managing the buffers that contain the contents to be rendered. You can have several views into the same surface.
trans-unit.target: 所述WaylandView对应于表面上的特定输出的呈现，管理包含要呈现的内容缓冲区。您可以在同一平面上具有多个视图。

trans-unit.source: The WlScaler extension provides a way for clients to resize and crop surface contents.
trans-unit.target: 该WlScaler扩展提供为客户调整和作物表面内容的方式。

trans-unit.source: The WlShell extension provides a way to associate a ShellSurface with a regular Wayland surface. Using the shell surface interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 该的WLShell扩展提供了一种将关联ShellSurface与常规Wayland的表面。使用外壳表面接口，客户端可以请求调整表面大小，移动表面等。

trans-unit.source: The XdgDecorationManagerV1 extension provides a way for a compositor to announce support for server-side window decorations, and for xdg-shell clients to communicate whether they prefer client-side or server-side decorations.
trans-unit.target: 该XdgDecorationManagerV1扩展提供了一个排字宣布为服务器端的窗口装饰提供支持的方式，并为XDG-壳客户端通信是否喜欢客户端或服务器端的装饰品。

trans-unit.source: The XdgShell extension provides a way to associate a XdgToplevel or XdgPopup with a regular Wayland surface. Using the XdgToplevel interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 该XdgShell扩展提供了一种将关联XdgToplevel或XdgPopup与常规Wayland的表面。使用XdgToplevel接口，客户端可以请求调整表面大小，移动表面等。

trans-unit.source: The XdgShellV5 extension provides a way to associate an XdgSurfaceV5 with a regular Wayland surface. Using the xdg_surface interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 该XdgShellV5扩展提供了一种联营XdgSurfaceV5与常规Wayland的表面。使用xdg_surface接口，客户端可以请求调整表面大小，移动表面等。

trans-unit.source: The XdgShellV6 extension provides a way to associate a XdgToplevelV6 or XdgPopupV6 with a regular Wayland surface. Using the XdgToplevelV6 interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 该XdgShellV6扩展提供了一种将关联XdgToplevelV6或XdgPopupV6与常规Wayland的表面。客户端可以使用XdgToplevelV6接口请求调整表面大小，移动表面等。

trans-unit.source: The accepted property of the request indicates whether the request is handled by the user code or the default dialog should be displayed. If you set the accepted property to true, make sure to call either dialogAccept() or dialogReject() afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 请求的accepted属性指示该请求是由用户代码处理还是应显示默认对话框。如果将accepted属性设置为 true ，请确保之后再调用dialogAccept（）或dialogReject（）。

trans-unit.source: The accepted property of the request indicates whether the request is handled by the user code or the default dialog should be displayed. If you set the accepted property to true, make sure to call either dialogAccept() or dialogReject() afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 请求的accepted属性指示该请求是由用户代码处理还是应显示默认对话框。如果将accepted属性设置为 true ，请确保之后再调用dialogAccept（）或dialogReject（）。

trans-unit.source: The accepted property of the request indicates whether the request is handled by the user code or the default context menu should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 请求的accepted属性指示该请求是由用户代码处理还是应显示默认上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: The accepted property of the request indicates whether the request is handled by the user code or the default dialog should be displayed. If you set the accepted property to true, make sure to call either dialogAccept() or dialogReject() afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 请求的accepted属性指示该请求是由用户代码处理还是应显示默认对话框。如果将accepted属性设置为 true ，请确保之后再调用dialogAccept（）或dialogReject（）。

trans-unit.source: The accepted property of the request indicates whether the request is handled by the user code or the default dialog should be displayed. If you set the accepted property to true, make sure to call either dialogAccept() or dialogReject() afterwards. The JavaScript call causing the request will be blocked until then.
trans-unit.target: 请求的accepted属性指示该请求是由用户代码处理还是应显示默认对话框。如果将accepted属性设置为 true ，请确保之后再调用dialogAccept（）或dialogReject（）。在此之前，将阻止导致请求的JavaScript调用。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterProtocolHandlerRequest type enables accepting or rejecting requests from the registerProtocolHandler API. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述RegisterProtocolHandlerRequest类型使接受或拒绝来自该请求registerProtocolHandler API。更多...

trans-unit.source: The WebEngineHistory type can be accessed by using the WebEngineView.navigationHistory property.
trans-unit.target: 所述WebEngineHistory类型可以通过使用被访问WebEngineView.navigationHistory属性。

trans-unit.source: The WebEngineScript type enables the programmatic injection of so called
trans-unit.target: 所述WebEngineScript类型使得能够所谓的编程注射

trans-unit.source: The WebEngineSettings type can be used to configure browser properties and generic attributes, such as JavaScript support, focus behavior, and access to remote content. This type is uncreatable, but the default settings for all web engine views can be accessed by using the WebEngine.settings property.
trans-unit.target: 所述WebEngineSettings类型可以被用来配置浏览器属性和通用属性，诸如JavaScript支持，聚焦行为，并获得远程内容。此类型是不可创建的，但是可以使用WebEngine.settings属性访问所有Web引擎视图的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The focusOnNavigationEnabled setting can be used to make the view automatically receive focus when a navigation operation occurs (like loading or reloading a page or navigating through history).
trans-unit.target: 该focusOnNavigationEnabled设置可以用来使当发生导航操作（例如加载或重新加载一个页面或通过历史导航）的视图中自动接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: The WebEngineView type enables QML applications to render regions of dynamic web content. It may share the screen with other QML types, such as a TabView, or fill the screen, as specified within the QML application.
trans-unit.target: 该WebEngineView类型使QML应用渲染的动态网页内容的区域。它可以与QML应用程序中指定的其他QML类型（例如TabView）共享屏幕或填充屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The backgroundColorChanged() signal is emitted when the web page background color changes.
trans-unit.target: 所述backgroundColorChanged（）当web页面的背景色改变信号被发射。

trans-unit.source: The findText() method can be used to search for a string on a web page, using the options described by FindFlags.
trans-unit.target: 所述FINDTEXT（）方法可被用于搜索的网页上的绳子，使用由所述的选项FindFlags。

trans-unit.source: The lifecycleState property is connected to the Page Lifecycle API specification, which specifies two new DOM events, freeze and resume, and adds a new Document.wasDiscarded boolean property. The freeze and resume events are fired when transitioning from the Active to the Frozen state, and vice-versa. The Document.wasDiscarded property is set to true when transitioning from the Discarded state to the Active state.
trans-unit.target: 该lifecycleState属性连接到页面生命周期API规范，它规定了两个新的DOM事件， freeze 和 resume ，并增加了一个新的 Document.wasDiscarded 布尔属性。该 freeze 和 resume 从过渡激发事件时 Active 到 Frozen state ，反之亦然。从 Discarded 状态转换为 Active 状态时， Document.wasDiscarded 属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: The lifecycleState property of the WebEngineView type is a read-write property that controls the current lifecycle state of the web view. This property is designed to place as few restrictions as possible on what states can be transitioned to. For example, it is allowed to freeze a web view that is currently playing music in the background, stopping the music. In order to implement a less aggressive resource-saving strategy that avoids interrupting user-visible background activity, the recommendedState property must be used.
trans-unit.target: WebEngineView类型的lifecycleState属性是一个读写属性，用于控制Web视图的当前生命周期状态。此属性旨在对可以转换到什么状态的限制尽可能少。例如，允许冻结当前正在后台播放音乐的Web视图，从而停止播放音乐。为了实现一种不太激进的资源节省策略，以避免中断用户可见的后台活动，必须使用RecommendationState属性。

trans-unit.source: The linkHovered() signal is emitted when a mouse pointer passes over a link and thus corresponds to the mouseover DOM event.
trans-unit.target: 所述linkHovered（）当鼠标指针经过的链路和因此对应于信号被发射 mouseover DOM事件。

trans-unit.source: The loading property holds whether an HTML page is currently loading. The loadingChanged() signal is emitted when loading the page begins, ends, or fails.
trans-unit.target: 该加载属性保存的HTML页面当前是否加载。所述loadingChanged（）加载页面开始，结束，或失败时信号被发射。

trans-unit.source: The recommendedState property of the WebEngineView type is a read-only property that calculates a safe limit on the lifecycleState property, taking into account the current activity of the web view. So, in the example of a web view playing music in the background, the recommended state will be Active since a more aggressive state would stop the music. If the application wants to avoid interrupting background activity, then it should avoid putting the web view into a more aggressively resource-saving lifecycle state than what's given by recommendedState.
trans-unit.target: 该recommendedState的财产WebEngineView类型是只读属性计算在安全限度lifecycleState财产，考虑到Web视图的当前活动。因此，在网络视图在后台播放音乐的示例中，推荐状态将为“ Active 因为更具攻击性的状态将停止音乐。如果应用程序要避免中断后台活动，那么就应该避免将Web视图成为一个更积极建设资源节约型生命周期状态比什么给出recommendedState。

trans-unit.source: The setActiveFocusOnPress() method can be used to create a UI element that should not get focus on press. This can be useful in a hybrid UI.
trans-unit.target: 该setActiveFocusOnPress（）方法可以用来创建，不应该在印刷机上获得焦点的UI元素。这在混合用户界面中很有用。

trans-unit.source: The webChannel property can be used to expose a WebChannel instance in the JavaScript context of the page it is rendering as qt.webChannelTransport.
trans-unit.target: 该webChannel属性可用于曝光WebChannel在它被呈现为页面的JavaScript的上下文实例 qt.webChannelTransport 。

trans-unit.source: The webChannel property can be used to expose a WebChannel instance in the JavaScript context of the page it is rendering as qt.webChannelTransport.
trans-unit.target: 该webChannel属性可以被用来在它被呈现为页面的JavaScript的背景下暴露WebChannel实例 qt.webChannelTransport 。

trans-unit.source: The WebViewLoadRequest type contains load status information for the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: 该WebViewLoadRequest类型包含请求的URL负载状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The DwmFeatures type enables you to extend a glass frame into the client area, as well as to control the behavior of Aero Peek and Flip3D.
trans-unit.target: 所述DwmFeatures类型允许您的玻璃框架延伸到客户区，以及用于控制航空皮克和的Flip3D的行为。

trans-unit.source: The JumpList type enables you to modify Windows Jump Lists.
trans-unit.target: 该的JumpList类型，可以修改的Windows跳转列表。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListCategory type represents a category that consists of several Jump List destinations and has a title.
trans-unit.target: 该JumpListCategory类型代表由几个跳转列表目的地，有一个标题类别。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListDestination type contains a path to a file that users can select from a Jump List to view or edit it with an application.
trans-unit.target: 该JumpListDestination类型包含一个文件的路径，用户可以选择从跳转列表查看或编辑它的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListLink type represents a command to execute an application.
trans-unit.target: 所述JumpListLink类型表示命令执行的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListSeparator type represents a separator in a Jump List. This value is used only for task lists.
trans-unit.target: 所述JumpListSeparator类型表示跳转列表的隔板。此值仅用于任务列表。

trans-unit.source: The TaskbarButton type enables you to set an overlay icon and to display a progress indicator on a taskbar button. An overlay icon indicates change in the state of the application. A progress indicator shows how time-consuming tasks are progressing.
trans-unit.target: 所述TaskbarButton类型，可以设置覆盖图标，并显示在任务栏按钮进度指示器。覆盖图标指示应用程序状态的变化。进度指示器显示了耗时的任务的进度。

trans-unit.source: The ThumbnailToolButton represents a button in a thumbnail toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 该ThumbnailToolButton代表缩略图工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: The clear() method can be used to discard information about signals that have already occurred to synchronize wait() with future signal emissions.
trans-unit.target: 在明确的（）方法可以用来丢弃有关已经发生同步的wait（）与未来的信号排放量的信号。

trans-unit.source: The keyPress(), keyRelease(), and keyClick() methods can be used to simulate keyboard events within unit tests. The events are delivered to the currently focused QML item. You can pass either a Qt.Key enum value or a latin1 char (string of length one)
trans-unit.target: 所述按键（） ，keyRelease（） ，和keyClick（）方法可用于模拟键盘事件的单元测试中。这些事件将传递到当前关注的QML项目。您可以传递Qt.Key枚举值或latin1字符（长度为一的字符串）

trans-unit.source: The mousePress(), mouseRelease(), mouseClick(), mouseDoubleClick(), mouseDoubleClickSequence() and mouseMove() methods can be used to simulate mouse events in a similar fashion.
trans-unit.target: 所述mousePress（） ，mouseRelease（） ，鼠标点击（） ，mouseDoubleClick（） ，mouseDoubleClickSequence（）和的mouseMove（）方法可用于模拟鼠标事件相似的方式。

trans-unit.source: The QModbusClient API is constructed around one QModbusClient object, which holds the common configuration and settings for the requests it sends. One QModbusClient should be enough for the whole Qt application.
trans-unit.target: 所述QModbusClient API是围绕一个构造QModbusClient对象，用于保存对发送请求的通用配置和设置。一个QModbusClient对于整个Qt应用程序应该足够了。

trans-unit.source: The QMutexLocker class automatically locks the mutex in its constructor and unlocks it when the destructor is invoked, at the end of the function. Locking the mutex ensures that access from different threads will be serialized. The mutex data member is declared with the mutable qualifier because we need to lock and unlock the mutex in value(), which is a const function.
trans-unit.target: QMutexLocker类在函数的末尾自动将互斥锁锁定在其构造函数中，并在调用析构函数时将其解锁。锁定互斥锁可确保对来自不同线程的访问进行序列化。该 mutex 数据部件与所声明的 mutable 限定词，因为我们需要锁定和解锁中的互斥 value() ，它是一个const函数。

trans-unit.source: The QNetworkConfiguration also supports the concept of service networks. This concept allows the grouping of multiple access point configurations into one entity. Such a group is called service network and can be beneficial in cases whereby a network session to a particular destination network is required (e.g. a company network). When using a service network the user doesn't usually care which one of the connectivity options is chosen (e.g. corporate WLAN or VPN via GPRS) as long as he can reach the company's target server. Depending on the current position and time some of the access points that make up the service network may not even be available. Furthermore automated access point roaming can be enabled which enables the device to change the network interface configuration dynamically while maintaining the applications connection to the target network. It allows adaption to the changing environment and may enable optimization with regards to cost, speed or other network parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该QNetworkConfiguration也支持服务网络的概念。这一概念允许将多个接入点配置分组为一个实体。这样的组称为服务网络，在需要到特定目标网络（例如公司网络）的网络会话的情况下可能是有益的。使用服务网络时，用户只要能到达公司的目标服务器，通常就不会在意选择哪个连接选项（例如，公司WLAN或通过GPRS的VPN）。根据当前位置和时间，组成服务网络的某些接入点可能甚至不可用。此外，可以启用自动访问点漫游，这使设备能够动态更改网络接口配置，同时保持应用程序与目标网络的连接。它允许适应不断变化的环境，并可以优化成本，速度或其他网络参数。

trans-unit.source: The QNetworkConfiguration class provides an abstraction of one or more access point configurations. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QNetworkConfiguration类提供的一个或多个接入点配置的抽象。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Active state implies that the configuration is Discovered. A configuration in this state is currently being used by an application. The underlying network interface has a valid IP configuration and can transfer IP packets between the device and the target network.
trans-unit.target: 该活动状态是指配置被发现。应用程序当前正在使用此状态下的配置。基础网络接口具有有效的IP配置，并且可以在设备和目标网络之间传输IP数据包。

trans-unit.source: The Discovered state implies that the configuration is Defined and the outside conditions are such that the configuration can be used immediately to open a new network session. An example of such an outside condition may be that the Ethernet cable is actually connected to the device or that the WLAN with the specified SSID is in range.
trans-unit.target: “ 发现”状态表示该配置已定义，并且外部条件使得该配置可立即用于打开新的网络会话。这种外部情况的示例可能是以太网电缆实际上已连接到设备，或者具有指定SSID的WLAN在范围内。

trans-unit.source: The Undefined state indicates that the system has knowledge of possible target networks but cannot actually use that knowledge to connect to it. An example for such a state could be an encrypted WLAN that has been discovered but the user hasn't actually saved a configuration including the required password which would allow the device to connect to it.
trans-unit.target: 该不定状态表明，该系统有可能的目标网络的知识，但实际上并不能利用这些知识来连接到它。出现这种状态的示例可能是已发现的加密WLAN，但用户实际上并未保存包括所需密码的配置，该密码将允许设备与其连接。

trans-unit.source: The QNetworkConfiguration::Type flag specifies to what category a configuration belongs. The QNetworkConfiguration::InternetAccessPoint type is the most common example. It represents a configuration that can be used to create a session. The above mentioned grouping behavior is provided by QNetworkConfiguration::ServiceNetwork configurations. Service networks are place holders until such time when the user attempts to open() a new session. At that point in time the system determines which of the configurations QNetworkConfiguration::children() is best to use. The selection algorithm is provided by the platform and is usually managed by network settings applications. A service network can only have one level of indirection which implies children can only be of type QNetworkConfiguration::InternetAccessPoint.
trans-unit.target: 该QNetworkConfiguration ::类型标志指定的配置属于哪个类别。该QNetworkConfiguration :: InternetAccessPoint类型是最常见的例子。它代表可用于创建会话的配置。上面提到的分组行为由QNetworkConfiguration :: ServiceNetwork配置提供。服务网络是占位符，直到用户尝试打开（）新会话。此时，系统将确定QNetworkConfiguration :: children中的哪些配置（）最好使用。选择算法由平台提供，通常由网络设置应用程序管理。服务网络只能具有一个间接级别，这意味着子级只能是QNetworkConfiguration :: InternetAccessPoint类型。

trans-unit.source: The interfaceIndex() function contains the index of the operating system's interface that received the packet. This value is the same one that can be set on a QHostAddress::scopeId() property and matches the QNetworkInterface::index() property. When sending packets to global addresses, it is not necessary to set the interface index as the operating system will choose the correct one using the system routing table. This property is important when sending datagrams to link-local destinations, whether unicast or multicast.
trans-unit.target: 所述interfaceIndex（）函数包含接收到的数据包中的操作系统的接口的索引。该值与可以在QHostAddress :: scopeId（）属性上设置的值相同，并且与QNetworkInterface :: index（）属性匹配。将数据包发送到全局地址时，无需设置接口索引，因为操作系统将使用系统路由表选择正确的接口索引。将数据报发送到单播或多播的本地链接目标时，此属性很重要。

trans-unit.source: The QObject-based version has the same internal state, and provides public methods to access the state, but in addition it has support for component programming using signals and slots. This class can tell the outside world that its state has changed by emitting a signal, valueChanged(), and it has a slot which other objects can send signals to.

trans-unit.source: The QOpenGLFramebufferObject class encapsulates an OpenGL framebuffer object, defined by the GL_EXT_framebuffer_object extension. It provides a rendering surface that can be painted on with a QPainter with the help of QOpenGLPaintDevice, or rendered to using native OpenGL calls. This surface can be bound and used as a regular texture in your own OpenGL drawing code. By default, the QOpenGLFramebufferObject class generates a 2D OpenGL texture (using the GL_TEXTURE_2D target), which is used as the internal rendering target.
trans-unit.target: 所述QOpenGLFramebufferObject类封装一个OpenGL帧缓冲区对象，由定义的 GL_EXT_framebuffer_object 扩展。它提供了一个渲染表面，可以使用QPainter在QOpenGLPaintDevice的帮助下进行绘制，或者使用本机OpenGL调用进行渲染。可以绑定此表面并将其用作您自己的OpenGL绘图代码中的常规纹理。默认情况下，QOpenGLFramebufferObject类生成2D OpenGL纹理（使用 GL_TEXTURE_2D 目标），该纹理用作内部渲染目标。

trans-unit.source: The QOpenGLWidget's associated OpenGL context is guaranteed to be current whenever initializeGL() and paintGL() are invoked. Do not attempt to create OpenGL resources before initializeGL() is called. For example, attempting to compile shaders, initialize vertex buffer objects or upload texture data will fail when done in a subclass's constructor. These operations must be deferred to initializeGL(). Some of Qt's OpenGL helper classes, like QOpenGLBuffer or QOpenGLVertexArrayObject, have a matching deferred behavior: they can be instantiated without a context, but all initialization is deferred until a create(), or similar, call. This means that they can be used as normal (non-pointer) member variables in a QOpenGLWidget subclass, but the create() or similar function can only be called from initializeGL(). Be aware however that not all classes are designed like this. When in doubt, make the member variable a pointer and create and destroy the instance dynamically in initializeGL() and the destructor, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 所述QOpenGLWidget的关联的OpenGL上下文保证每当为当前initializeGL（）和paintGL（）被调用。在调用initializeGL（）之前，请勿尝试创建OpenGL资源。例如，在子类的构造函数中尝试编译着色器，初始化顶点缓冲区对象或上载纹理数据将失败。必须推迟执行这些操作才能初始化InitializeGL（）。 Qt的某些OpenGL帮助器类，例如QOpenGLBuffer或QOpenGLVertexArrayObject，具有匹配的延迟行为：可以在没有上下文的情况下实例化它们，但是所有初始化都延迟到创建之前（）或类似的呼叫。这意味着它们可以用作QOpenGLWidget子类中的普通（非指针）成员变量，但只能从initializeGL（）调用create（）或类似函数。但是请注意，并非所有类都是这样设计的。如有疑问，请使成员变量成为指针，并分别在initializeGL（）和析构函数中动态创建和销毁实例。

trans-unit.source: The QOpenGLWidget's context is made current in the destructor, allowing for safe destruction of any child object that may need to release OpenGL resources belonging to the context provided by this widget.

trans-unit.source: The QPaintDevice class provides several functions returning the various device metrics: The depth() function returns its bit depth (number of bit planes). The height() function returns its height in default coordinate system units (e.g. pixels for QPixmap and QWidget) while heightMM() returns the height of the device in millimeters. Similiarily, the width() and widthMM() functions return the width of the device in default coordinate system units and in millimeters, respectively. Alternatively, the protected metric() function can be used to retrieve the metric information by specifying the desired PaintDeviceMetric as argument.
trans-unit.target: 所述的QPaintDevice类提供若干功能返回的各种设备的度量：所述深度（）函数返回其位深度（位平面的数量）。的高度（）函数返回其默认高度坐标系统的单元（例如像素的QPixmap和QWidget的），而高mm（）返回在毫米的装置的高度。类似地，width（）和widthMM（）函数分别以默认坐标系单位和毫米返回设备的宽度。或者，可以通过指定所需的保护的metric（）函数来检索指标信息。PaintDeviceMetric作为参数。

trans-unit.source: The logicalDpiX() and logicalDpiY() functions return the horizontal and vertical resolution of the device in dots per inch. The physicalDpiX() and physicalDpiY() functions also return the resolution of the device in dots per inch, but note that if the logical and physical resolution differ, the corresponding QPaintEngine must handle the mapping. Finally, the colorCount() function returns the number of different colors available for the paint device.
trans-unit.target: 所述logicalDpiX（）和logicalDpiY（）函数返回该装置的每英寸的点数的水平和垂直分辨率。所述physicalDpiX（）和physicalDpiY（）函数也归还该设备的每英寸的点数的分辨率，但需要注意的是，如果逻辑和物理分辨率不同，相应的QPaintEngine必须处理的映射。最后，colorCount（）函数返回绘画设备可用的不同颜色的数量。

These are often used in combination with the QPainter::Antialiasing render hint.

trans-unit.source: The QPainter::Antialiasing value indicates that the engine should antialias edges of primitives if possible, i.e. smoothing the edges by using different color intensities.
trans-unit.target: 所述的QPainter ::抗锯齿值表示发动机应原语的抗混叠边缘如果可能的话，即，通过使用不同的颜色强度平滑的边缘。

trans-unit.source: The RenderHint enum is used to specify flags to QPainter that may or may not be respected by any given engine. The QPainter::Antialiasing value indicates that the engine should antialias edges of primitives if possible, i.e. smoothing the edges by using different color intensities.
trans-unit.target: 该RenderHint枚举用于指定标志来了QPainter可能会或可能不会被任何给定的发动机尊重。所述的QPainter ::抗锯齿值表示发动机应原语的抗混叠边缘如果可能的话，即，通过使用不同的颜色强度平滑的边缘。

trans-unit.source: The RenderHint enum specifies flags to QPainter that may or may not be respected by any given engine. QPainter::Antialiasing indicates that the engine should antialias edges of primitives if possible, QPainter::TextAntialiasing indicates that the engine should antialias text if possible, and the QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform indicates that the engine should use a smooth pixmap transformation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该RenderHint枚举指定标志来了QPainter可能会或可能不会被任何给定的发动机尊重。QPainter :: Antialiasing指示引擎应尽可能对图元的边缘进行抗锯齿，QPainter :: TextAntialiasing指示引擎应尽可能对文本进行抗锯齿，而QPainter :: SmoothPixmapTransform指示引擎应使用平滑的像素映射转换算法。

trans-unit.source: The RenderHint enum specifies flags to QPainter that may or may not be respected by any given engine. QPainter::Antialiasing indicates that the engine should antialias edges of primitives if possible, QPainter::TextAntialiasing indicates that the engine should antialias text if possible, and the QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform indicates that the engine should use a smooth pixmap transformation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 该RenderHint枚举指定标志来了QPainter可能会或可能不会被任何给定的发动机尊重。QPainter :: Antialiasing指示引擎应尽可能对图元的边缘进行抗锯齿，QPainter :: TextAntialiasing指示引擎应尽可能对文本进行抗锯齿，而QPainter :: SmoothPixmapTransform指示引擎应使用平滑的像素映射转换算法。

trans-unit.source: The isActive() function indicates whether the painter is active. A painter is activated by the begin() function and the constructor that takes a QPaintDevice argument. The end() function, and the destructor, deactivates it.
trans-unit.target: 的isActive（）函数表示的画家是否处于活动状态。绘画者由begin（）函数和采用QPaintDevice参数的构造函数激活。所述端（）函数，和析构函数，停用它。

trans-unit.source: The renderHints() function returns a flag that specifies the rendering hints that are set for this painter. Use the setRenderHint() function to set or clear the currently set RenderHints.
trans-unit.target: 所述renderHints（）函数返回一个标志，指定了此画家设定的呈现提示。使用setRenderHint（）函数设置或清除当前设置的RenderHints。

trans-unit.source: The setWorldTransform() function can replace or add to the currently set worldTransform(). The resetTransform() function resets any transformations that were made using translate(), scale(), shear(), rotate(), setWorldTransform(), setViewport() and setWindow() functions. The deviceTransform() returns the matrix that transforms from logical coordinates to device coordinates of the platform dependent paint device. The latter function is only needed when using platform painting commands on the platform dependent handle, and the platform does not do transformations nativly.
trans-unit.target: 该setWorldTransform（）函数可以更换或添加到当前设置的worldTransform（）。所述resetTransform（）函数复位使用中所做的任何转换翻译（），刻度（），剪切（），旋转（），setWorldTransform（），setViewport（）和setWindow（）函数。该deviceTransform（）返回从平台坐标绘制设备的逻辑坐标转换为设备坐标的矩阵。仅当在依赖于平台的句柄上使用平台绘制命令时，才需要后者的功能，并且平台不会自然地进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The controlPointRect() function returns the rectangle containing all the points and control points in this path. This function is significantly faster to compute than the exact boundingRect() which returns the bounding rectangle of this painter path with floating point precision.

trans-unit.target: 所述currentPosition（）函数返回已添加的最后一个子路径（或初始启动点）的结束点。所述的ElementAt（）函数可以被用于检索各个子路径元素，所述

trans-unit.source: The currentPosition() of the QPainterPath object is always the end position of the last subpath that was added (or the initial start point). Use the moveTo() function to move the currentPosition() without adding a component. The moveTo() function implicitly starts a new subpath, and closes the previous one. Another way of starting a new subpath is to call the closeSubpath() function which closes the current path by adding a line from the currentPosition() back to the path's start position. Note that the new path will have (0, 0) as its initial currentPosition().
trans-unit.target: QPainterPath对象的currentPosition（）始终是最后添加的子路径的结束位置（或初始起点）。使用moveTo（）函数移动currentPosition（）而不添加组件。该的moveTo（）函数隐式启动一个新的子路径，并关闭前一个。启动新子路径的另一种方法是调用closeSubpath（）函数，该函数通过将从currentPosition（）返回行的起始位置的一行添加到当前路径中，从而关闭当前路径。请注意，新路径的初始currentPosition（）将具有（0，0 ）。

trans-unit.source: The currentPosition() of the QPainterPath object is always the end position of the last subpath that was added (or the initial start point). Use the moveTo() function to move the currentPosition() without adding a component. The moveTo() function implicitly starts a new subpath, and closes the previous one. Another way of starting a new subpath is to call the closeSubpath() function which closes the current path by adding a line from the currentPosition() back to the path's start position. trans-unit.source: The toFillPolygon() and toFillPolygons() functions first convert all the subpaths to polygons, then uses a rewinding technique to make sure that overlapping subpaths can be filled using the correct fill rule. Note that rewinding inserts additional lines in the polygon so the outline of the fill polygon does not match the outline of the path.
trans-unit.target: 该toFillPolygon（）和toFillPolygons（）函数第一子路径转换所有多边形，然后使用一个收卷技术，以确保重叠的子路径可以使用正确的填充规则来填补。请注意，倒带会在多边形中插入其他线条，因此填充多边形的轮廓与路径的轮廓不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The QPicture class is a paint device that records and replays QPainter commands. A picture serializes painter commands to an IO device in a platform-independent format. QPicture is also resolution independent, i.e. a QPicture can be displayed on different devices (for example svg, pdf, ps, printer and screen) looking the same.
trans-unit.target: 该QPicture类是涂料设备的记录和重放QPainter的命令。图片以平台无关的格式将Painter命令序列化到IO设备。QPicture也是与分辨率无关的，即QPicture可以在看起来相同的不同设备（例如svg，pdf，ps，打印机和屏幕）上显示。

trans-unit.source: The QPicture class is a paint device that records and replays QPainter commands. A picture serializes the painter commands to an IO device in a platform-independent format. Everything that can be painted on a widget or pixmap can also be stored in a picture.
trans-unit.target: 该QPicture类是涂料设备的记录和重放QPainter的命令。图片以平台无关的格式将Painter命令序列化到IO设备。可以在小部件或像素图上绘制的所有内容也可以存储在图片中。

trans-unit.source: The QPixmap class is an off-screen image representation which is designed and optimized for showing images on screen. Unlike QImage, the pixel data in a pixmap is internal and is managed by the underlying window system, i.e. pixels can only be accessed through QPainter functions or by converting the QPixmap to a QImage.
trans-unit.target: 所述的QPixmap类是被设计和用于在屏幕上显示的图像进行了优化的离屏图像表示。与QImage不同，像素图中的像素数据是内部的，并由基础窗口系统管理，即，像素只能通过QPainter函数或通过将QPixmap转换为QImage来访问。

trans-unit.source: The cacheKey() function returns a number that uniquely identifies the contents of the QPixmap object.
trans-unit.target: 所述cacheKey（）函数返回一个数字，唯一标识的内容的QPixmap对象。

trans-unit.source: The cacheKey() function returns a number that uniquely identifies the contents of the QPixmap object.

trans-unit.source: The createHeuristicMask() function creates and returns a 1-bpp heuristic mask (i.e. a QBitmap) for this pixmap. It works by selecting a color from one of the corners and then chipping away pixels of that color, starting at all the edges. The createMaskFromColor() function creates and returns a mask (i.e. a QBitmap) for the pixmap based on a given color.
trans-unit.target: 所述createHeuristicMask（）函数创建并返回一个1-BPP启发式掩模（即QBitmap该像素映像）。它的工作原理是从任一角中选择一种颜色，然后从所有边缘开始切去该颜色的像素。所述createMaskFromColor（）函数创建并返回一个掩模（即QBitmap用于基于给定的彩色像素映像）。

trans-unit.source: The createHeuristicMask() function creates and returns a 1-bpp heuristic mask (i.e. a QBitmap) for this pixmap. It works by selecting a color from one of the corners and then chipping away pixels of that color, starting at all the edges. The createMaskFromColor() function creates and returns a mask (i.e. a QBitmap) for the pixmap based on a given color.
trans-unit.target: 所述createHeuristicMask（）函数创建并返回一个1-BPP启发式掩模（即QBitmap该像素映像）。它的工作原理是从任一角中选择一种颜色，然后从所有边缘开始切去该颜色的像素。所述createMaskFromColor（）函数创建并返回一个掩模（即QBitmap用于基于给定的彩色像素映像）。

trans-unit.source: The depth() function returns the depth of the pixmap. The defaultDepth() function returns the default depth, i.e. the depth used by the application on the given screen.
trans-unit.target: 的深度（）函数返回像素映像的深度。的[预设的（）函数返回默认深度，即由给定的屏幕上的应用程序中使用的深度。

trans-unit.source: The hasAlphaChannel() returns true if the pixmap has a format that respects the alpha channel, otherwise returns false. The hasAlpha(), setMask() and mask() functions are legacy and should not be used. They are potentially very slow.
trans-unit.target: 所述hasAlphaChannel（）返回 true ，如果像素映像具有方面alpha通道，否则返回一个格式 false 。所述hasAlpha（），setMask（）和掩模（）函数是遗留并且不应当被使用。它们可能非常慢。

trans-unit.source: The scaled(), scaledToWidth() and scaledToHeight() functions return scaled copies of the pixmap, while the copy() function creates a QPixmap that is a plain copy of the original one.
trans-unit.target: 的缩放（），scaledToWidth（）和scaledToHeight（）函数返回缩放的像素图的副本，而复制（）函数创建了一个的QPixmap，它是原始之一的普通复印。

trans-unit.source: The size(), width() and height() functions provide information about the pixmap's size. The rect() function returns the image's enclosing rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 的大小（），宽度（）和高度（）函数提供关于像素映像大小信息。的矩形（）函数返回图像的包围矩形。

trans-unit.source: The transformed() function returns a copy of the pixmap that is transformed with the given transformation matrix and transformation mode: Internally, the transformation matrix is adjusted to compensate for unwanted translation, i.e. transformed() returns the smallest pixmap containing all transformed points of the original pixmap. The static trueMatrix() function returns the actual matrix used for transforming the pixmap.

trans-unit.source: The QPlaceIdReply can be considered a multipurpose reply in that it can be used to save places, save categories, remove places and remove categories. In each case it returns an identifier of the place or category that was added, modified or removed.

trans-unit.source: The QPlaceManager class provides an abstraction of the datastore which contains place information. The functions provided by the QPlaceManager and primarily asynchronous and follow a request-reply model. Typically a request is given to the manager, consisting of a various set of parameters and a reply object is created. The reply object has a signal to notify when the request is done, and once completed, the reply contains the results of the request, along with any errors that occurred, if any.
trans-unit.target: 该QPlaceManager类提供了包含地点的信息数据存储的抽象。QPlaceManager提供的功能主要是异步的，并遵循请求-答复模型。通常，向管理器发出一个请求，该请求由各种参数集组成，并创建一个回复对象。回复对象有一个信号来通知何时完成请求，完成后，回复将包含请求的结果以及发生的任何错误（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: The QPlaceManager class provides the interface which allows clients to access places stored in a particular backend. More...
trans-unit.target: 该QPlaceManager类提供了允许客户端存储在特定的后端进入场地的接口。更多...

trans-unit.source: The finished() signal can be used to monitor the progress of an operation. Once an operation is complete, the error() and errorString() methods provide information on whether the operation completed successfully. If successful, the reply will contain the results for that operation, that is, each subclass will have appropriate functions to retrieve the results of an operation.

trans-unit.source: The QProcess object will immediately enter the Starting state. If the process starts successfully, QProcess will emit started(); otherwise, errorOccurred() will be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 在QProcess中的对象将立即进入启动状态。如果进程成功启动，则QProcess将发出started（）；否则，将发出errorOccurred（）。

trans-unit.source: The finished() signal provides the exit code and exit status of the process as arguments, and you can also call exitCode() to obtain the exit code of the last process that finished, and exitStatus() to obtain its exit status. If an error occurs at any point in time, QProcess will emit the errorOccurred() signal. You can also call error() to find the type of error that occurred last, and state() to find the current process state.
trans-unit.target: 在结束（）信号提供工艺参数的退出代码和退出状态，你也可以调用退出码（）来获得最后的进程的退出代码完成，并退出状态（）来获得它的退出状态。如果在任何时间点发生错误，QProcess将发出errorOccurred（）信号。您还可以调用error（）查找上次发生的错误的类型，并调用state（）查找当前进程的状态。

trans-unit.source: The AsynchronousIfNested mode reconciles this problem. By using AsynchronousIfNested, the ListView delegates are instantiated asynchronously if the ListView itself is already part of an asynchronous instantiation, and synchronously otherwise. In the case of a nested asynchronous instantiation, the outer asynchronous instantiation will not complete until after all the nested instantiations have also completed. This ensures that by the time the outer asynchronous instantitation completes, inner items like ListView have already completed loading their initial delegates.
trans-unit.target: 该AsynchronousIfNested模式调和这个问题。通过使用AsynchronousIfNested，如果ListView本身已经是异步实例化的一部分，则异步实例化ListView委托，否则同步。在嵌套异步实例的情况下，外部异步实例将在所有嵌套实例也都完成之后才能完成。这样可以确保在外部异步实例化完成时，诸如ListView之类的内部项目已经完成了其初始委托的加载。

trans-unit.source: The QQuickPaintedItem makes it possible to use the QPainter API with the QML Scene Graph. It sets up a textured rectangle in the Scene Graph and uses a QPainter to paint onto the texture. The render target can be either a QImage or, when OpenGL is in use, a QOpenGLFramebufferObject. When the render target is a QImage, QPainter first renders into the image then the content is uploaded to the texture. When a QOpenGLFramebufferObject is used, QPainter paints directly onto the texture. Call update() to trigger a repaint.
trans-unit.target: 通过QQuickPaintedItem，可以将QPainter API与QML场景图一起使用。它在“场景图”中设置了一个纹理矩形，并使用QPainter将其绘制到纹理上。渲染目标可以是QImage或使用OpenGL时的QOpenGLFramebufferObject。当渲染目标是QImage时，QPainter首先渲染到图像中，然后将内容上载到纹理。使用QOpenGLFramebufferObject时，QPainter直接绘制在纹理上。调用update（）触发重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: The sceneGraphInitialized() signal is emitted on the rendering thread before the QML scene is rendered to the screen for the first time. If the rendering scene graph has been released, the signal will be emitted again before the next frame is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 所述sceneGraphInitialized前QML场景渲染到屏幕上的第一次（）信号被发射渲染线程上。如果已释放渲染场景图，则将在渲染下一帧之前再次发射信号。

trans-unit.source: The sceneGraphInitialized() signal is emitted on the rendering thread before the QML scene is rendered to the screen for the first time. If the rendering scene graph has been released, the signal will be emitted again before the next frame is rendered. A visible, on-screen QQuickWindow is driven internally by a render loop, of which there are multiple implementations provided in the scene graph. For details on the scene graph rendering process, see Qt Quick Scene Graph.
trans-unit.target: 所述sceneGraphInitialized前QML场景渲染到屏幕上的第一次（）信号被发射渲染线程上。如果释放了渲染场景图，则将在渲染下一帧之前再次发出信号。屏幕上的可见QQuickWindow由 render loop 内部驱动，场景图中提供了多种实现方式。有关场景图渲染过程的详细信息，请参见Qt Quick Scene Graph。

trans-unit.source: The QQuickWindow::sceneGraphInvalidated() signal is emitted when cleanup occurs. The QQuickWindow::sceneGraphInitialized() signal is emitted when a new scene graph is recreated for this window. Make a Qt::DirectConnection to these signals to be notified.
trans-unit.target: 所述QQuickWindow :: sceneGraphInvalidated当清理发生（）信号被发射。所述QQuickWindow :: sceneGraphInitialized当一个新的场景图中重新创建此窗口（）信号被发射。做一个Qt的:: DirectConnection这些信号通知。

trans-unit.source: The unregisterResource() function removes a reference to a particular file. If there are QResource objects that currently reference resources related to the unregistered file, they will continue to be valid but the resource file itself will be removed from the resource roots, and thus no further QResource can be created pointing into this resource data. The resource itself will be unmapped from memory when the last QResource that points to it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 所述unregisterResource（）函数删除一个特定的文件的引用。如果存在当前引用与未注册文件相关的资源的QResource对象，它们将继续有效，但是资源文件本身将从资源根目录中删除，因此无法再创建指向该资源数据的QResource。当最后一个指向资源的QResource被销毁时，资源本身将不会从内存中映射。

trans-unit.source: The unregisterResource() function removes a reference to a particular file. If there are QResource objects that currently reference resources related to the unregistered file, they will continue to be valid but the resource file itself will be removed from the resource roots, and thus no further QResource can be created pointing into this resource data. The resource itself will be unmapped from memory when the last QResource that points to it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 所述unregisterResource（）函数删除一个特定的文件的引用。如果存在当前引用与未注册文件相关的资源的QResource对象，它们将继续有效，但是资源文件本身将从资源根目录中删除，因此无法再创建指向该资源数据的QResource。当最后一个指向资源的QResource被销毁时，资源本身将不会从内存中映射。

trans-unit.source: The QSGGeometry class provides low-level storage for graphics primitives in the Qt Quick Scene Graph. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QSGGeometry类提供图形基元在低电平存储Qt Quick的场景图。更多...

trans-unit.source: The QSGGeometry class stores the geometry of the primitives rendered with the scene graph. It contains vertex data and optionally index data. The mode used to draw the geometry is specified with setDrawingMode(), which maps directly to the graphics API's drawing mode, such as GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, GL_TRIANGLES, or GL_POINTS in case of OpenGL.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGGeometry类存储与场景图渲染图元的几何形状。它包含顶点数据和索引数据（可选）。使用setDrawingMode（）指定用于绘制几何图形的模式，该模式直接映射到图形API的绘制模式，例如OpenGL时为 GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP ， GL_TRIANGLES 或 GL_POINTS 。

trans-unit.source: The QSGGeometry is a software buffer and client-side in terms of OpenGL rendering, as the buffers used in 2D graphics typically consist of many small buffers that change every frame and do not benefit from being uploaded to graphics memory. However, the QSGGeometry supports hinting to the renderer that a buffer should be uploaded using the setVertexDataPattern() and setIndexDataPattern() functions. Whether this hint is respected or not is implementation specific.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGGeometry是在OpenGL渲染换算的软件缓冲器和客户端，如在2D图形中使用的缓冲液典型地由该改变每帧，并且不被上传到图形存储器中获益的许多小缓冲器。但是，QSGGeometry支持向渲染器提示应使用setVertexDataPattern（）和setIndexDataPattern（）函数上载缓冲区。是否遵守此提示是特定于实现的。

trans-unit.source: The QSGMaterial API is very low-level. A more convenient API, which provides almost all the same features, is available through QSGSimpleMaterialShader.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGMaterial API很级别低。通过QSGSimpleMaterialShader提供了更方便的API，几乎提供了所有相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: The QSGMaterial and QSGMaterialShader form a tight relationship. For one scene graph (including nested graphs), there is one unique QSGMaterialShader instance which encapsulates the QOpenGLShaderProgram the scene graph uses to render that material, such as a shader to flat coloring of geometry. Each QSGGeometryNode can have a unique QSGMaterial containing the how the shader should be configured when drawing that node, such as the actual color used to render the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGMaterial和QSGMaterialShader形成紧密的关系。对于一个场景图（包括嵌套图），有一个唯一的QSGMaterialShader实例，该实例封装了场景图用于渲染该材质的QOpenGLShaderProgram，例如将着色器着色为几何的平坦着色。每个QSGGeometryNode可以具有一个唯一的QSGMaterial，其中包含绘制该节点时应如何​​配置着色器，例如用于渲染几何体的实际颜色。

trans-unit.source: The QSGMaterial and QSGMaterialShader subclasses form a tight relationship. For one scene graph (including nested graphs), there is one unique QSGMaterialShader instance which encapsulates the QOpenGLShaderProgram the scene graph uses to render that material, such as a shader to flat coloring of geometry. Each QSGGeometryNode can have a unique QSGMaterial containing the how the shader should be configured when drawing that node, such as the actual color to used to render the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGMaterial和QSGMaterialShader子形成紧密的关系。对于一个场景图（包括嵌套图），有一个唯一的QSGMaterialShader实例，该实例封装了场景图用来渲染该材质的QOpenGLShaderProgram，例如将着色器着色为几何的平坦着色。每个QSGGeometryNode可以具有唯一的QSGMaterial，其中包含绘制该节点时应如何​​配置着色器，例如用于渲染几何的实际颜色。

trans-unit.source: The QSGMaterial and QSGMaterialShader form a tight relationship. For one scene graph (including nested graphs), there is one unique QSGMaterialShader instance that encapsulates the shaders and other data the scene graph uses to render an object with that material. Each QSGGeometryNode can have a unique QSGMaterial that defines how the graphics pipeline must be configured while drawing the node. An instance of QSGMaterialShader is never created explicitly by the user, it will be created on demand by the scene graph through QSGMaterial::createShader(). The scene graph creates an instance of QSGMaterialShader by calling the QSGMaterial::createShader() method, ensuring that there is only one instance of each shader implementation.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGMaterial和QSGMaterialShader形成紧密的关系。对于一个场景图（包括嵌套图），存在一个唯一的QSGMaterialShader实例，该实例封装了着色器和场景图用来使用该材质渲染对象的其他数据。每个QSGGeometryNode可以具有唯一的QSGMaterial，该QSGMaterial定义在绘制节点时必须如何配置图形管道。用户绝不会明确创建QSGMaterialShader的实例，它将由场景图通过QSGMaterial :: createShader（）按需创建。场景图通过调用QSGMaterial :: createShader创建QSGMaterialShader的实例。（）方法，确保每个着色器实现只有一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The QSGMaterial and QSGMaterialShader form a tight relationship. For one scene graph (including nested graphs), there is one unique QSGMaterialShader instance which encapsulates the QOpenGLShaderProgram the scene graph uses to render that material, such as a shader to flat coloring of geometry. Each QSGGeometryNode can have a unique QSGMaterial containing the how the shader should be configured when drawing that node, such as the actual color used to render the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 该QSGMaterial和QSGMaterialShader形成紧密的关系。对于一个场景图（包括嵌套图），有一个唯一的QSGMaterialShader实例，该实例封装了场景图用来渲染该材质的QOpenGLShaderProgram，例如将着色器着色为几何的平坦着色。每个QSGGeometryNode可以具有唯一的QSGMaterial，其中包含绘制该节点时应如何​​配置着色器，例如用于渲染几何的实际颜色。

trans-unit.source: The activate() function is called by the scene graph when a shader is is starting to be used. trans-unit.source: The QSqlQuery::value() function returns the value of a field in the current record. Fields are specified as zero-based indexes. QSqlQuery::value() returns a QVariant, a type that can hold various C++ and core Qt data types such as int, QString, and QByteArray. The different database types are automatically mapped into the closest Qt equivalent. In the code snippet, we call QVariant::toString() and QVariant::toInt() to convert variants to QString and int.

QSqlQuery::value() returns a QVariant, a type that can hold various C++ and core Qt data types such as int, QString, and QByteArray. The different database types are automatically mapped into the closest Qt equivalent. In the code snippet, we call QVariant::toString() and QVariant::toInt() to convert variants to QString and int.
trans-unit.target: 该QSqlQuery ::值（）函数返回一个字段的当前记录的值。字段被指定为从零开始的索引。QSqlQuery :: value（）返回QVariant，该类型可以容纳各种C ++和核心Qt数据类型，例如 int ，QString和QByteArray。不同的数据库类型将自动映射到最接近的Qt等效项。在代码片段中，我们调用QVariant :: toString（）和QVariant :: toInt（）将变量转换为QString和 int 。

trans-unit.source: The childMode property determines how child states are treated. For non-parallel state groups, the setInitialState() function must be called to set the initial state. The child states are mutually exclusive states, and the state machine needs to know which child state to enter when the parent state is the target of a transition.
trans-unit.target: 该childMode属性决定孩子状态如何对待。对于非并行状态组，必须调用setInitialState（）函数来设置初始状态。子状态是互斥状态，并且当父状态是转换的目标时，状态机需要知道要输入哪个子状态。

trans-unit.source: The setErrorState() sets the state's error state. The error state is the state that the state machine will transition to if an error is detected when attempting to enter the state (e.g. because no initial state has been set).
trans-unit.target: 该setErrorState（）设置状态的错误状态。错误状态是在尝试进入状态时检测到错误的状态机将转换到的状态（例如，因为尚未设置初始状态）。

trans-unit.source: The QStyle class is an abstract base class that encapsulates the look and feel of a GUI. QStyleFactory creates a QStyle object using the create() function and a key identifying the style. The styles are either built-in or dynamically loaded from a style plugin (see QStylePlugin).
trans-unit.target: 在将QStyle类是一个抽象基类，封装了GUI的外观和感觉。QStyleFactory使用create（）函数和一个标识样式的键来创建QStyle对象。样式是内置样式或从样式插件动态加载的样式（请参见QStylePlugin）。

trans-unit.source: The QStyle class is an abstract base class that encapsulates the look and feel of a GUI. QStyleFactory creates a QStyle object using the create() function and a key identifying the style. The styles are either built-in or dynamically loaded from a style plugin (see QStylePlugin).
trans-unit.target: 在将QStyle类是一个抽象基类，封装了GUI的外观和感觉。QStyleFactory使用create（）函数和一个标识样式的键来创建QStyle对象。样式是内置样式或从样式插件动态加载的样式（请参见QStylePlugin）。

trans-unit.source: The hitTestComplexControl() function returns the sub control that the mouse pointer is over in a complex control. Usually, this is simply a matter of using subControlRect() to get the bounding rectangles of the sub controls, and then seeing which rectangle contains the position of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 所述hitTestComplexControl（）函数返回副控制鼠标指针悬停在一个复杂的控制。通常，这只是使用subControlRect（）获取子控件的边界矩形，然后查看哪个矩形包含光标位置的问题。

trans-unit.source: The pixelMetric() function returns a pixel metric, which is a style-dependent size given in screen pixels. It takes a value of the PixelMetric enum and returns the correct measurement. Note that pixel metrics do not necessarily have to be static measurements, but can be calculated with, for example, the style option.
trans-unit.target: 所述pixelMetric（）函数返回一个像素度量，它是在屏幕像素给出一个取决于样式尺寸。它采用PixelMetric枚举的值并返回正确的度量。注意，像素度量不一定必须是静态度量，而是可以使用例如style选项进行计算。

trans-unit.source: The subControlRect() function is used to calculate bounding rectangles for sub controls in complex controls. When you implement a new style, you reimplement subControlRect() and calculate the rectangles that are different from the super class.
trans-unit.target: 所述subControlRect（）函数用于计算在复杂的控制的子控制边界矩形。当您实现新样式时，将重新实现 subControlRect() 并计算与超类不同的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The subElementRect() function takes a SubElement enum value and calculates a bounding rectangle for a sub element. The style uses this function to know where to draw the different parts of an element. This is mainly done for reuse; if you create a new style, you can use the same location of sub elements as the super class.

trans-unit.source: The QSyntaxHighlighter class is a base class for implementing QTextDocument syntax highlighters. A syntax highligher automatically highlights parts of the text in a QTextDocument. Syntax highlighters are often used when the user is entering text in a specific format (for example source code) and help the user to read the text and identify syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 所述QSyntaxHighlighter类是用于实现一个基类另外，QTextDocument语法荧光笔。语法highligher会自动突出显示QTextDocument中的部分文本。当用户以特定格式（例如源代码）输入文本时，经常使用语法突出显示工具，以帮助用户阅读文本并识别语法错误。

trans-unit.source: The currentBlockState() and previousBlockState() functions return an int value. If no state is set, the returned value is -1. You can designate any other value to identify any given state using the setCurrentBlockState() function. Once the state is set the QTextBlock keeps that value until it is set set again or until the corresponding paragraph of text is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 所述currentBlockState（）和previousBlockState（）函数返回一个int值。如果未设置任何状态，则返回值为-1。您可以使用setCurrentBlockState（）函数指定其他任何值来标识任何给定状态。设置状态后，QTextBlock会保留该值，直到再次设置该值或删除相应的文本段落为止。

trans-unit.source: The Qt::SquareCap style is a square line end that covers the end point and extends beyond it by half the line width. The Qt::FlatCap style is a square line end that does not cover the end point of the line. And the Qt::RoundCap style is a rounded line end covering the end point.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的:: SquareCap风格是方行结束，覆盖端点和半线宽度超出它延伸。在Qt的:: FlatCap风格是方行结束未覆盖该行的终点。和Qt的:: RoundCap风格是覆盖端点的圆线末端。

trans-unit.source: The Qt::BevelJoin style fills the triangular notch between the two lines. The Qt::MiterJoin style extends the lines to meet at an angle. And the Qt::RoundJoin style fills a circular arc between the two lines.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的:: BevelJoin风格充满两条线之间的三角缺口。在Qt的:: MiterJoin风格以一定角度延伸线，以满足。和Qt的:: RoundJoin风格充满两条线之间的圆弧。

trans-unit.source: The TextElideMode enum can also be used in many situations to fine-tune the appearance of aligned text.
trans-unit.target: 该TextElideMode枚举也可以在许多情况下用来微调对齐文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: The Qt3DCore::QBuffer class stores the raw data. This acts purely as an array of memory. In most cases a Qt3DCore::QBuffer will be used indirectly by being referenced by one or more Qt3DRender::QAttributes. However there are times when a QBuffer may be used directly as the value property of a QParameter when dealing with Uniform Buffer Objects (UBO) or Shader Storage Buffer Objects (SSBO).
trans-unit.target: 该Qt3DCore :: Q缓冲器级存储的原始数据。这纯粹是作为内存数组。在大多数情况下Qt3DCore :: Q缓冲器将通过由一个或多个Qt3DRender :: QAttributes被引用间接使用。但是，有时在处理统一缓冲区对象（UBO）或着色器存储缓冲区对象（SSBO）时，可以将QBuffer直接用作QParameter的value属性。
